content.brief: Our work force is the first line of defense in protecting the People’s information. We will foster a culture where every employee, from average employee to system administrator, recognizes their critical role in the protecting the People’s information in the cyber risk management construct, and shares information on a continual basis to address new and emerging cyber threats. We will continue to invest in timely and focused cyber awareness training and ensure access to the right education to execute their responsibilities. We will hire high quality and talented individuals, compensate them fairly, and provide them with advancement opportunities. We will expand the pipeline of skilled cybersecurity talent for the Government and beyond through efforts targeted at education at all levels.
